item.description:
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types through Herb's descriptions, hats and songs for each type. Herb emphasizes the strengths and challenges of each type and how to relate effectively to each type and how your type can grow. Herb does an interactive process to type each person, as well as discover your type sequence.


7:30-9:30/10. Option to end between 9:30 and.

Refreshments served.

Normal cost $40, sliding scale based on ability to pay from $40 to $20.

Herb Pearce is a leading expert on the Enneagram, having taught it for over 20 years. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living, both available from him. He is a relationship coach and therapist, team development trainer in organizations and teaches the Enneagram throughout New England and other parts of the US.

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com

781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Personality Types Workshop
